sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { MultiStageFormData, DeveloperInfo } from '../../types/FormTypes'; interface Props { formData: MultiStageFormData; updateFormData: ( section: K, data: Partial ) => void; nextPage: () => void; previousPage: () => void; skipPage: () => void; } export default function DeveloperInfoPage({ formData, updateFormData }: Props) { const data = formData.developerInfo; const handleInputChange = (field: keyof DeveloperInfo, value: string) => { updateFormData('developerInfo', { [field]: value }); }; const countries = ['US', 'CA', 'UK', 'DE', 'FR', 'AU', 'JP', 'CN', 'IN', 'BR']; const timezones = ['UTC-8', 'UTC-7', 'UTC-6', 'UTC-5', 'UTC-4', 'UTC-3', 'UTC', 'UTC+1', 'UTC+2', 'UTC+8', 'UTC+9']; const languages = ['English', 'Spanish', 'German', 'Portuguese', 'Chinese', 'French']; const skillLevels = ['Beginner', 'Intermediate', 'Expert', 'Rather Not Say']; return (
handleInputChange('fullName', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="Enter your full name" required />
handleInputChange('email', e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="your.email@example.com" required />
